thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 29 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Viper Energy Partners Says Board Of General Partner Unanimously Approved Change Of Viper's Federal Income Tax Status

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Viper Energy Partners Says Board Of General Partner Unanimously Approved Change Of Viper's Federal Income Tax Status

organizations.name: viper energy partners says board of general partner unanimously approved change of viper

text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Viper Energy Partners Lp:
* VIPER ENERGY PARTNERS - BOARD OF GENERAL PARTNER HAS UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED A CHANGE OF VIPER’S FEDERAL INCOME TAX STATUS
* VIPER ENERGY PARTNERS - CHANGE OF CO’S FEDERAL INCOME TAX STATUS FROM PASS-THROUGH PARTNERSHIP TO TAXABLE ENTITY VIA A “CHECK BOX” ELECTION
* VIPER ENERGY PARTNERS LP - DO NOT EXPECT THIS ELECTION TO BE TAXABLE TO VIPER OR ITS CURRENT UNITHOLDERS, AND VIPER’S BUSINESS MODEL WILL NOT CHANGE
* VIPER ENERGY PARTNERS LP - BELIEVES THIS ELECTION WILL ALLOW CO TO SIGNIFICANTLY EXPAND INVESTOR BASE, BOTH IN U.S. & INTERNATIONALLY
* VIPER ENERGY PARTNERS - MINERALS BUSINESS TO CONTINUE TO BE TAXED AS PARTNERSHIP FOR FEDERAL, STATE INCOME TAX PURPOSES
* VIPER ENERGY PARTNERS LP - “THERE IS SIGNIFICANT OPPORTUNITY AHEAD FOR VIPER IN HIGHLY FRAGMENTED PRIVATE MINERAL MARKET” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
